page.title: 13BA Chemicals Ltd (Alcan) CSP
page.content: Part of the old Chalfont Estate situ- ated near the Misbourne, the plant is centred around the old Manor House currently being renovated.Part of a Canadian company operating worldwide, it employs 300 local staff mainly doing research.There are 3 main groups of research:development and quality control of foils and metallic materials;additive of aluminium oxides to various products ie polishing com- pounds,china,glass,spark plugs,ceramic colours and glazes to give increased hardness;the latest line of research is the additive of aluminium hydroxide as a fire retardant and smoke suppressant in carpets,rubbers,plastics,cable coverings and motor vehicle components. One disadvantage at the moment is that the additive makes the product brittle, further research is being continued.
